cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine in the day. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot.
🌞 I come out every morning.
🌎 Without me, Earth would be very cold.

cosmos.question: I am round and float in space. You live on me! What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am mostly water.
🌱 I have lots of plants and animals.
🏡 People build houses and live on me.

cosmos.question: I come out at night, and sometimes I look like a banana. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I shine because the sun lights me up.
🌑 Sometimes you can't see me at all.
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.

cosmos.question: I am a hot, giant ball of burning gas far away. I twinkle at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I look small, but I'm really huge.
🌌 There are millions of me.
🔭 You can see me better with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am red and rocky, and some robots explore me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People are planning to visit me one day.
🌍 I am a planet like Earth, but colder.
🍫 I am the color of rust or reddish brown.

cosmos.question: I have rings around me made of ice and rock. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I am a big planet made of gas.
💍 My rings are very beautiful.
💨 I am far away from the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am a group of many stars. I look like a fuzzy cloud in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I'm much bigger than a single star.
✨ There are billions like me in the universe.
💫 My stars are held together by gravity.

cosmos.question: I am a big group of stars that make a picture in the sky. People used to tell stories about me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Ursa Major is one example.
🔭 You can find me using a star chart.
🌃 I am part of the night sky.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of ice and dust that flies around the sun. I have a tail when I get close to the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am like a dirty snowball.
☀️ I get brighter as I approach the sun.
🧊 My tail always points away from the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am a rock that floats in space. Sometimes I fall to Earth and become a shooting star. What am I?

hints.text: 🌠 I burn up in the atmosphere.
☄️ Some are big, some are small.
🚀 I travel through space.

bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I'm often red or black and very small. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I live in colonies with many friends.
🧺 I might be found at a picnic.
💪 I am strong for my size!

bug.question: I fly around and make honey. I have black and yellow stripes. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I like flowers!
🐝 I buzz as I fly.
🍯 I make something sweet.

bug.question: I have colorful wings and like to fly. I start as a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat lots of leaves before I change.
🌈 I am very pretty to look at.
🦋 I float gently on the breeze.

bug.question: I hop and jump with strong legs. I am often green and live in grassy places. What am I?

hints.text: 🎵 I make a chirping sound.
🌱 I eat plants.
🦘 I can jump very high!

bug.question: I have a shell and crawl very slowly. I leave a silvery trail behind me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌧️ I like damp places.
🥬 I might eat your garden plants.
🐌 I move very, very slowly.

bug.question: I glow in the dark and fly around at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I light up!
🌃 I'm easier to see when it's dark.
🔦 I am not a lightbulb, but I glow.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I build a special home to trap things.
🕷️ I have more legs than you do.
🪰 Flies might get caught in my home.

bug.question: I live in water as a baby, and fly when I grow up. I have big eyes. What am I?

hints.text: 💦 I start my life in a pond or lake.
🚁 I look like a tiny helicopter when I fly.
👁️ I have very large eyes for seeing insects.

bug.question: I eat wood and live in tunnels. I'm small and pale. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I can damage houses if I eat too much.
🏠 I live in big families underground.
🐜 I am a distant cousin of the ant.

bug.question: I drink blood and make you itchy. I buzz near your ear when you are sleeping. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I can leave a red bump on your skin.
🦇 I am not a bat, but I do bite.
😴 I bother you when you are trying to sleep.
